channel.title: OECD on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in OECD on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: OECD Guidelines for Cryptography Policy
item.description: Published: March 1997 URL: https://www.oecd.org/sti/ieconomy/guidelinesforcryptographypolicy.htm Tags: 1990s OECD Abstract: Data and research on e-commerce including measuring the information economy, internet economy outlook, open internet, openness, key ICT indicators, digital economy policy papers., The Guidelines are primarily aimed at governments, in terms of the policy recommendations herein, but with anticipation that they will be widely read and followed by both the private and public sectors.
